meanings.sent1: The teacher dismissed the inconsequentialities of the student's doodles.
meanings.sent2: She ignored the inconsequentialities and focused on the main points of the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The inconsequentialities of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, the inconsequentialities were like dust in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The inconsequentialities faded into obscurity as the real issues took center stage.

meanings.definition: Things that are unimportant or trivial
meanings.sent1: He spent hours worrying about inconsequentialities like what to wear to the party.
meanings.sent2: The clutter on her desk consisted of various inconsequentialities.
meanings.sent3: The group argued over inconsequentialities like the color of the logo.
meanings.sent4: In the end, all the inconsequentialities didn't matter as long as they were happy.
meanings.sent5: She cleared her mind of inconsequentialities to focus on what truly mattered.
